name: The most suitable variable name
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-4-task-4.png)

You need to create a variable to store the number of daily reports.
Create a variable using the `let` keyword without assigning a value to the variable.
Choose the best name to create this variable:
`chisloDnevnyhOtchetov`, `number_of_daily_reports`, `numberOfDailyReports`, `numberofdailyreports`, `number`, `a`.
